game.name: Indian Truck Simulator 3D
game.description:
Do you have a crush on car driving games? Is your big dream to sit behind the steering wheel of a big truck? No worries! We have brought to you today a brand new racing game where you will have to run a big sized truck in your own way. Join this unique truck challenge and get ready to drive lovely Indian trucks and complete the cargo deliveries safely at their destinations! It will be amazing to try your hands at the heavy Indian engine. All you need to do is show off your unique cargo heavy truck driving skills to ensure your win!

Explore this monster truck game to feel the power of heavy engine with breakneck jungle and mountain! Be careful while delivering heavy cargo securely to their destination! Try to keep your eyes all the time on the road to avoid the dangerous and reach safely on time! Indian Truck Simulator 3D is absolutely a big treat to all those gamers who are passionate about driving a car on the road between the mountains. It’s pretty challenging to drive in any weather.
 
Get in your truck right away and see yourself operating a monster truck on a risky road! Challenges may come in the form of high roads in the mountains. You also have to drive in tropical heat where it’s difficult to see in front of the truck mirror or sometimes in the snowy and icy roads. Visibility on the roads may be worsen anytime with the snowflakes. Transport material from point A to point after selecting the colour of your vehicle! Run it on the road at the speed you choose! Stay away from your colleagues who are also on the same truck. A sudden collision may lose you game!
